participant_2.background:
I'm trying to be more mindful of my reactions and to find healthier ways to cope with stress.
i drive a blue honda civic.
i got engaged to be married in paris , france.
My most difficult decision was whether to follow my dreams or to stay in a stable job.
I'm trying to make my parents proud by singing to their clients, but it's not easy.

content.text: Hi! I'm trying to be more mindful of my reactions and find healthier ways to cope with stress. How about you?
Hey! I'm on the same boat! I'm trying to find healthy ways to cope with stress, too.
That's great! I've been trying to exercise more and eat healthier.
That's awesome! I've been trying to do the same, but it's not always easy.
I know, right? It's hard to find the motivation sometimes.
Yeah, but we can do it! We just have to keep at it.
You're right! We can do it!
Awesome! Let's keep each other accountable!
Sounds good to me!
So, what are your hobbies?
I love to read and make 3d models for video games and animations.
That's awesome! I love to read, too. What are some of your favorite books?
I love to read fantasy and sci-fi. Some of my favorite authors are Brandon Sanderson, Neil Gaiman, and Terry Pratchett.
I love those authors! I've read all of Sanderson's books. I'm also a big fan of Jim Butcher and Patrick Rothfuss.
Oh, I love Jim Butcher, too! I've read all of his Dresden Files books. I haven't read any Patrick Rothfuss yet, but I've heard great things about his books.
You should definitely check out his books! They're amazing!
I will! Thanks for the recommendation!
No problem! So, what do you do for fun?
I love to go out with my friends and family. I also love to travel.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I love to travel, too. Where have you been the most?
I've been to a lot of places, but my favorite place to travel is Paris.
That's awesome! I've always wanted to go to Paris.
It's a beautiful city! I'm sure you would love it.
Thanks! I hope I can go someday.
You should! It's definitely worth a visit.
I'll keep that in mind!
